segments.text: Is there a daily passenger ship to Dalian ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many days does it take to Dalian ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About one day . It arrives in Dalian at 10:00 a . m . tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many ports do we call at on our passage to Qingdao ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The ship is going very fast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps she makes about 25 knots an hour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The sea is calm and peaceful . A sea trip is always enjoyable in fine weather like this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I hope it will remain fine all the way .
segments.speaker: S2
